chat_history.message: Hello, My iPhone 12 mini has the above problem: Package has been stuck at UPS for a week. When will it finally arrive??? Is there no more reliable courier????? Thank you very much for your help,

Hello!

The tracking status of this order has not changed in 4 business days and is now considered lost as per Back Market delivery policy. We have requested the Back Market certificate of non-receipt and picture of the customer's ID to arrange a refund or a replacement.

Once all the paperwork has been gathered, we’ll let you know if the customer prefers a refund or a reshipment. The deadline is 24 hours from reception of the documents.

If at any point the delivery begins to move again, a refund will not be issued and the order is considered to be late.

Best regards,
Claudia Back Market

Dear Backcare,

We have informed our logistics partner about this situation. Please assist the customer to provide a handwritten CND with IMEI 353016114517732 included, and pictures of the customer's ID. 

Regards,
SY

Hello,

The Documents from the Customer.  

Please send a new device to the customer in 24h.  

Thank you, 
Aysah, from Back Market

Dear Backcare,

Kindly provide us with a handwritten CND with IMEI included. The current CND is invalid as it is not handwritten.

Thank you for your assistance.

Regards,
SY

Hello,

BM.

Regards,
Aysah, Back Market

Dear Backcare,

Thank you for your assistance.

regards,
JY

Hello ecomobile,

We would like to inform you that, in accordance with our Quality Charter, we have refunded 294.45€ to the customer for not respecting the deadline to send a new device.

Kind regards, 
Claudia from Back Market
